an1.69:1: "Bhikkhus, I do not see even a single thing that so causes unarisen wholesome qualities to arise and arisen unwholesome qualities to decline as clear comprehension.[n.56]Sampajaññaṁ. Here,Mpsays only that this is a term for wisdom(paññā). For a fuller treatment ofsampajaññaaccording to the commentarial method, seeBodhi989: 94–30.For one who clearly comprehends, unarisen wholesome qualities arise and arisen unwholesome qualities decline."
